techmeme.title: Gemini shares opened up 32.2% at $37.01 in its Nasdaq debut, giving it a ~$4.4B market cap, after the Winklevoss' exchange operator raised $425M in its IPO (Tanaya Macheel/CNBC)
Mastodon plans to launch quote posts starting next week with safety features allowing users to control how they get quoted, to avoid "dunking" (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Sources: Polymarket considers an offer valuing it at ~$9B, up from $1B in the summer; Kalshi is close to raising money at a $5B valuation, up from $2B in June (The Information)
On Techmeme's 20th birthday, its founder explains what's behind the site's consistency, debunks some supposed media trends, and outlines future directions (Gabe Rivera/Techmeme News)
Micro1, a Scale AI competitor that lets AI companies find contractors for data labeling and training, raised a $35M Series A led by 01A at a $500M valuation (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
